message: Is there a way to install Virtualenvwrapper on Windows without Cygwin?
I found http://justindriscoll.us/2009/03/virtualenv-helper-for-windows.html but am not sure if it's outdated
@audreyr There is some work on a Powershell port but it isn't quite ready for prime-time, yet. https://bitbucket.org/guillermooo/virtualenvwrapper-cross-compatible/overview

@audrey As Doug says, the cross-compatible version isn't ready yet, but there's a more stable one here: https://bitbucket.org/guillermooo/virtualenvwrapper. It isn't obvious how to create extensions in this one, but userscripts work. I plan to finish the cross-compatible version soon.
